chapter.title: Contextual Authorization: Students
chapter.para: The rules in this section apply specifically to users that are associated with the Student entity in the data store.

para.emphasis: RULE:
Student has context to all global entities.
RULE:
Student does not have write context to any entities except:
RULE:
Student has context to their own student entity.
RULE:

Student has context to attendance that are directly associated to the student, regardless of the date and educationOrganization. Student does not need to be currently associated with an educationOrganization in order to see their own attendances from that educationOrganization.
RULE:
Student has context to each calendarDate in their school.
RULE:
Student has context to every cohort to which they were ever associated.
RULE:
Student has context to every courseTranscript associated to a StudentAcademicRecord that is directly associated to the student.
RULE:
Student has context to every gradebookEntry that is directly associated to a section to which the student is associated.
RULE:
Student has context to every grade that references a studentSectionAssociation for the student.
RULE:
Student has context to every parent directly associated with them.
RULE:
Student has context to every reportCard directly associated with them.
RULE:
Student has context to every staff member associated with their current: educationOrganization, Program, Cohort.
RULE:
Student has context to every staffCohortAssociation of their current cohorts.
RULE:
Student has context to every staffEducationOrgAssignmentAssociation of their current educationOrganizations.
RULE:
Student has context to every staffProgramAssociations of their current programs.
RULE:
Student has context to every studentAcademicRecord that is directly associated to the student.
RULE:
Student has context to every studentCohortAssociation that is directly associated to the student plus every studentCohortAssociations of their current cohorts.
RULE:
Student has context to every studentCompetency that is directly associated with a studentSectionAssociation that directly associates to the student.
RULE:
Student has context to every studentGradebookEntry that is directly associated to the student.
RULE:
Student has context to every studentParentAssociation that directly references the student.
RULE:
Student has context to every studentProgramAssociation that directly references the student plus every studentProgramAssociations of their current programs.
RULE:
Student has context to the name field of other students who share a current section, program or cohort association.
RULE:
Student has context to every student school association that directly references the student.
RULE:
Student has context to every student section association that directly references the student plus every studentSectionAssociation of their current sections.
RULE:
Student has context to every teacherSchoolAssociation of their current schools.
RULE:
Student has context to every teacherSectionAssociation of their current sections.
RULE:
Student do not have context to view any discipline data.
